evidence.text:
Person B: Ummm...He is this much
Person B: There is one more child... I had her last month.
Person A: How old are you?
Person B: Maybe 25... or 24... ummm...
Person B: 22... yes... I am sure...

Person B: I told my husband..but he is scared. He says he won’t be able to lift heavy things if he gets it done. You know he is a brick layer? It makes them lose their strength!
Person A: Take it every day. If you want another child, stop taking it one month in -
Person B: No NO! I'll die before I have one more.
